alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Leflore (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 2:18PM CST until March 10 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yalobusha At Whaley affecting Carroll and Leflore Counties. For the Lower Yazoo ...including Whaley, Greenwood, Belzoni, Yazoo City, Sunflower, Anguilla...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yalobusha At Whaley. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Lowland flooding is occurring near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.0 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Yalobusha Whaley 21.0 20.0 Mon 1 pm CST 20.7 21.0 21.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued late tonight at 7 PM CST.
